_meta.source: Researched from JNTO, TripAdvisor, and local guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Yokohama port area and central Tokyo

transit_routes.name: JR Line to Tokyo
transit_routes.note: Frequent trains to Tokyo Station. Get Suica or Pasmo IC card for easy payment.

transit_routes.name: Yokohama Waterfront Walk
transit_routes.note: Chinatown 10 min walk from pier. Cup Noodles Museum in Minato Mirai area.

featured_experiences.name: teamLab Planets
featured_experiences.note: Book tickets days ahead online. Mind-blowing immersive digital art.

featured_experiences.name: Tsukiji Outer Market Breakfast
featured_experiences.note: Go early (7-9am). Wholesale moved to Toyosu but outer market still excellent.

featured_experiences.name: Senso-ji & Asakusa
featured_experiences.note: Tokyo's oldest temple. Best early morning or evening. Free entry.
